Name: applachiantrail_1940_41_appalachian_merged
LayerDisplayName: Appalachian Trail Line in Southern VA, 1940-1941 (vector data)
Abstract: This line layer represents a merged  vector layer from two layers digitized from the image of the historic paper map entitled: PACT Map 13 (1940).jpg by Potomac Appalachian Trail Club, prepared by David Dick and the  PACT map 14 (1941).jpg produced by Potomac Appalachian Trail Club, drafted by E.P. Schreier and edited by Myron Avery.  The original scale of PACT maps were unknown.
FgdcText:

    <descript>
      <abstract>This line layer represents a merged  vector layer from two layers digitized from the image of the historic paper map entitled: PACT Map 13 (1940).jpg by Potomac Appalachian Trail Club, prepared by David Dick and the  PACT map 14 (1941).jpg produced by Potomac Appalachian Trail Club, drafted by E.P. Schreier and edited by Myron Avery.  The original scale of PACT maps were unknown.  

 </abstract>
      <purpose>The dataset was created  for a research grant for the Fenwick Fellowship in 2019 on Appalachian Trail History Project.   The grantee was Prof. Mills Kelly in the Department of History at George Mason University. </purpose>
      <supplinf>. </supplinf>
    </descript>

    <lineage>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Production of this vector layer began with the scanning of the two paper maps on a high-resolution scanner, then georeferenced against a topographic base map provided by ArcGIS 10.5.   These georeferenced two maps were digitized to create a line layer.  Then two layers were merged in ArcGIS 10.5</procdesc>
        <srcused>paper map</srcused>
        <procdate>12/12/2018</procdate>
        <srcprod>tiff file</srcprod>
      </procstep>
    </lineage>
